name: The Carrot Quest!
description:
Your village has been kidnapped by [INSERT VILLAN NAME], and it's your job to rescue them! Fight against... Moon Aliens? And others to find your village and save them from the hands of T̸̢̮̥̺͈̯̣̈́̋͐͆͛̐̐͒͘ḩ̵͖̠̹̯̃E̸̞͑͒͝ ̶͚̘̥̈c̷͎̎Ǘ̵͙̪͎r̸̢̰̥̘͈͇̔̐͌͋͛̒̚͝R̵͎̬͆s̸̢͔͉͙̺͓͎͉̋̽͑̚͠ȩ̶̟̘͎̲̣̉̈Ḏ̴̨͉͒͂͛̔ ̸̦̻͓̋̓͂̋̚͠O̵̧̡̝̣͖̣̠̟̗͒̄Ņ̵͉̙̖͕̓è̵̡̊̒̏͆͂͝ .

P.S.

I have no idea if LiNUX and MacOS files work, if they don't please let me know. Thanks!

This game was started couple months ago, and we worked hard, but this is just to see what people think about it so far, the music will get annoying after a bit, we're working on that as well, our main concern, is how well the game runs.
